Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy.Description: Spectra were obtained in transmission mode

Differential scanning calorimetry.Description: Used to check the glass transition temperature (Tg) to ensure complete curing

Thermogravimetric analysis.Description: Performed in N2 for both treated and untreated nanoparticles to determine the surface coverage of the silane coupling agent on the nanoparticles. A 10-50mg sample was heated from 25°C to 900°C with a constant heating rate of 10°C/min.
